name: The Demo Collection for Amiga CDTV
overview: The Demo CD is packed with over 12,000 files - 600 Megabytes of Public Domain Software, nearly 700 floppy disks crammed on one CD! • Play dozens of exciting PD/Shareware games • Create music with Protracker - over 4,000 samples and 1,000 tunes supplied • Watch hundreds of excellent demos and animations. • Try out demos of commercial software before buying. • Use the fonts, images, and clip-art in your own graphics and DTP software
